title: Update Documentation for New Task Management Features
description: Update the project documentation to include information about the new delete task and subtask management features that were recently added to the Windsurf Task Master.

title: Update README.md with New Features
description: Add information about the delete task and subtask management features to the main README.md file, including examples of how to use the new tools.

title: Update API.md with New Methods
description: Document the new TaskManager methods for deleting tasks and managing subtasks in the API.md file, including method signatures, parameters, and return values.

title: Create Usage Examples
description: Create code examples showing how to use the new delete task and subtask management tools, including examples of deleting tasks by various criteria and managing subtasks effectively.
